mapper.select: SELECT COMID, TITLE, CONTENT, HISTORY, PEOPLE_NUM, LINK, IMAGE_PATH FROM COMPANY_INFO ORDER BY COMID OFFSET #{startRecord} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMPANY_INFO (COMID, TITLE, CONTENT, HISTORY, PEOPLE_NUM, LINK, IMAGE_PATH) VALUES (#{comid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{history}, #{peopleNum}, #{link}, #{imagePath})
